welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Fulton, where southern charm meets modern allure. Take in our vibrant culture, delicious food, and friendly locals as you explore all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Waffle House
restaurants.description: Waffle House is a breakfast spot located in Fairburn.

restaurants.name: Just Turkey
restaurants.description: Just Turkey is a american restaurant located in Fairburn.

restaurants.name: Ruchda Wings
restaurants.description: Ruchda Wings is a wings joint located in Fairburn.

restaurants.name: Golden Krust Caribbean Restaurant
restaurants.description: Golden Krust Caribbean Restaurant is a caribbean restaurant located in Fairburn.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a café located in Fairburn.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Maynard H. Jackson Jr. International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport, catering to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and offers convenient access to parking and rental car services.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport is primarily used for international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
